paragraph: Call us at (845) 303-8777 for a FREE Case Review

detailsData.title: Experience
detailsData.content: Our attorneys have more than 150 years of combined experience in the practice of law. We've spent most of our careers fighting exclusively for the financial rights of injured people in New York.

detailsData.title: Record of Results
detailsData.content: The attorneys in our firm have a long record of success, not only at trial but also in negotiating out-of-court settlements that suit our clients' best interests.

detailsData.title: We Answer Our Phones
detailsData.content: Whenever you need us, we're here. Our attorneys promise to give you the personal and individualized attention you deserve. Even when we're out of the office at night or on weekends, if you need us, someone is here to answer the phone — 24/7.

detailsData.title: No Upfront Costs
detailsData.content: We are partners in your success. Our firm will not charge you a fee for our services unless and until we get you money. Even then, our recovery will only be a percentage of your recovery.

subHeading: Dedicated to helping injury victims and their families achieve the financial compensation they need and peace of mind they deserve.
valueProp: In today's world, it's hard to get a fair shake from the people who've caused you harm. Reckless drivers, careless doctors, negligent landlords, irresponsible pet owners, and so on, when they fail to behave reasonably, they can produce real hardship in your life. Even more frustrating, the insurance companies that are sometimes liable for these damages rarely step up to the plate on their own. If you've recently been injured (or suffered losses) because of someone else's negligence, you might be having a hard time getting the money you're owed. Or, even if an insurer has offered you compensation, there's a good chance it's for a lot less than you deserve. An experienced Kingston personal injury attorney can fight to change all that.
CTA: Call us at (845) 303-8777 for a FREE Case Review

testimonalData.text: Wonderful, caring, and helpful staff. I will continue to trust and use them for any legal matters.
testimonalData.author: Justine

testimonalData.text: Kevin Harp is a great attorney! He was always very professional & personable and kept me constantly in the loop. All of my phone calls, questions & concerns were always answered in a very timely manner. All of the staff here was consistently polite and very helpful! Highly recommend!
testimonalData.author: Erica

testimonalData.text: My family has hired Joe O 'Connor and his firm 3x in the past and we would never use anyone else. With each case, we were treated like family, and kept in the loop about everything going on, which I really appreciated. Joe personally was available to talk to us when we needed him and explained things in an easy to understand way.
testimonalData.author: Michelle
